name: vec_avg
description:
Taking mean of the vector field x

Input: Vector of value of 1 instrument in a day: (2, 3, 5, 6, 3, 8, 10)
Output: 37 / 7 = 5.29

name: vec_count
description: Number of elements in vector field x

name: vec_sum
description:
Sum of vector field x

Input: Vector of value of 1 instrument in a day: (2, 3, 5, 6, 3, 8, 10)
Output: 2 + 3 + 5 + 6 + 3 + 8 + 10 = 37
